document.full_text: apple inc ceo steve jobs, who is out on medical leave, has been ordered to answer questions from lawyers for a group of consumers accusing the company of creating a music-download monopoly.
document.title: apple's jobs ordered to answer itunes questions
lines_and_colors: apple inc ceo steve jobs, who is out on medical leave, has been ordered to answer questions from lawyers for a group of consumers accusing the company of creating a music-download monopoly.
